      • Constructor Detail

      • Method Detail

        • public void addSourceFolder(String sourceLocation)

          Adds the resources from a source folder to a given IArchiveBuilder

          throws:
          PackagerException if an error occurred
          throws:
          SealedPackageException if the APK is already sealed.
          throws:
          DuplicateFileException if a file conflicts with another already added to the APK at the same location inside the APK archive.
          Parameters:
          sourceLocation - the source folder.
